document.title: Pellete de liens du 21-07-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
:: phpPatterns() Patterns for PHP (Tags: php tutorial faq design-patterns )
bobbyvandersluis.com | Unobtrusive Flash Objects (UFO) v1.0 ( via ) UFO is a DOM script that detects and embeds Flash objects. (Tags: flash accessibilite xhtml dom )
Franto.com Flash blog ( via ) More than 100 collected links to Maelstrom (Flash Player 8 beta) examples ! (Tags: flash demo actionscript )
Dynamic thumbnails and preview images with DOM, CSS and PHP ( via ) Sometimes we want to offer a visitor a preview of what is lurking behind a link, especially when it is a huge picture and there might not be a need to load it. (Tags: css photo dom thumbs )
Google Maps - Lunar Landing Sites ( via ) Carte de la lune. Ne riez pas (Tags: google maps haha )
Les responsables de Mozilla et Gnome veulent creer un front "anti-Longhorn" - Actualites - ZDNet.fr Les developpeurs de logiciels libres s'inquietent de la place qu'ils auront dans ce futur OS. (Tags: libre mozilla windows gnome longhorn )
Bric-a-brac DotClear : Plugin Gsitemap -Just call me Pep. Le nom parle de lui-meme : il s'agit d'un plugin permettant la creation d'un fichier au format Google Sitemaps. (Tags: dotclear google plugin )
Death Star Home Cinema Subwoofer ( via ) L'etoile noire en subwoofer ^^ (Tags: son haha )
mozdev.org - searchsidebar: index The purpose of the Searchsidebar project is to bring the Advanced Mozilla-Search feature to Firefox. (Tags: firefox extension moteur )
